name: The Legend Of The 6
description:
A rpg for the original gameboy made for the Curdle Jam #20

Why the game works with the theme: The main villain, who is actually revealed later in the game (spoilers, I know. Plz don't spoiler world war 2, I haven't finished that show yet), descendes into madness. 

A tale of friends, family and villains without a good motif!

(Linux and Mac emulator aren't tested, so if there are any issues let me know!)
